cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha.title: up-alpha
cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha.description: Alpha features. Commands may be removed in future releases.

cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-migration.title: up-alpha-migration
cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-migration.description: Migrate control planes to Upbound Managed Control Planes.

cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-migration-ex.title: up-alpha-migration-export
cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-migration-ex.description: The 'export' command is used to export the current state of a Crossplane or Universal Crossplane (xp/uxp) control plane into an archive file. This file can then be used for migration to Upbound Managed Control Planes.

cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-migration-im.title: up-alpha-migration-import
cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-migration-im.description: The 'import' command imports a control plane state from an archive file into an Upbound managed control plane.

cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-migration-pa.title: up-alpha-migration-pause-toggle
cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-migration-pa.description: The 'pause-toggle' command is used to pause or unpause resources affected by a migration, ensuring that only migration-induced pauses are undone.

cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-space-billin.title: up-alpha-space-billing-export
cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-space-billin.description: Export a billing report for submission to Upbound.

cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-space-connec.title: up-alpha-space-connect
cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-space-connec.description: Connect an Upbound Space to the Upbound web console.

cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-space-discon.title: up-alpha-space-disconnect
cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-space-discon.description: Disconnect an Upbound Space from the Upbound web console.

cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-space-list.title: up-alpha-space-list
cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-space-list.description: List all accessible spaces in Upbound.

cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-space-mirror.title: up-alpha-space-mirror
cli-reference/yaml/up-alpha-space-mirror.description: Managing the mirroring of artifacts to local storage or private container registries.

cli-reference/yaml/up-composition-render.title: up-composition-render
cli-reference/yaml/up-composition-render.description: Run a composition locally to render an XR into composed resources.

cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane.title: up-controlplane
cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane.description: Interact with control planes in the current context, both in the cloud and in a local Space.

cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-conne.title: up-controlplane-connect
cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-conne.description: Deprecated: Connect kubectl to control plane.

cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-conne.title: up-controlplane-connector
cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-conne.description: Connect an App Cluster to a control plane.

cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-conne.title: up-controlplane-connector-install
cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-conne.description: Install mcp-connector into an App Cluster.

cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-conne.title: up-controlplane-connector-uninstall
cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-conne.description: Uninstall mcp-connector from an App Cluster.

cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-disco.title: up-controlplane-disconnect
cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-disco.description: Deprecated: Disconnect kubectl from control plane.

cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-list.title: up-controlplane-list
cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-list.description: List control planes for the organization.

cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-simul.title: up-controlplane-simulation-create
cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-simul.description: Start a new control plane simulation and wait for the results.

cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-simul.title: up-controlplane-simulation-list
cli-reference/yaml/up-controlplane-simul.description: List control plane simulations for the account.

cli-reference/yaml/up-dependency-add.title: up-dependency-add
cli-reference/yaml/up-dependency-add.description: Add a dependency to the current project.

cli-reference/yaml/up-dependency-update-.title: up-dependency-update-cache
cli-reference/yaml/up-dependency-update-.description: Update the dependency cache for the current project.

cli-reference/yaml/up-example-generate.title: up-example-generate
cli-reference/yaml/up-example-generate.description: Generate an Example Claim (XRC) or Composite Resource (XR).

cli-reference/yaml/up-function-generate.title: up-function-generate
cli-reference/yaml/up-function-generate.description: Generate an Function for a Composition.

cli-reference/yaml/up-login.title: up-login
cli-reference/yaml/up-login.description: Login to Upbound. Will attempt to launch a web browser by default. Use --username and --password flags for automations.

cli-reference/yaml/up-organization-token.title: up-organization-token
cli-reference/yaml/up-organization-token.description: Generates an organization-scoped token to authenticate with a Cloud space.

cli-reference/yaml/up-organization-user-.title: up-organization-user-invite
cli-reference/yaml/up-organization-user-.description: Invite a user to the organization.

cli-reference/yaml/up-organization-user-.title: up-organization-user-remove
cli-reference/yaml/up-organization-user-.description: Remove a member from the organization.

cli-reference/yaml/up-profile-create.title: up-profile-create
cli-reference/yaml/up-profile-create.description: Create a new Upbound Profile without logging in.

cli-reference/yaml/up-profile-use.title: up-profile-use
cli-reference/yaml/up-profile-use.description: Select an Upbound Profile as the default.

cli-reference/yaml/up-profile-view.title: up-profile-view
cli-reference/yaml/up-profile-view.description: View the Upbound Profile settings across profiles.

cli-reference/yaml/up-project-build.title: up-project-build
cli-reference/yaml/up-project-build.description: Build a project into a Crossplane package.

cli-reference/yaml/up-project-move.title: up-project-move
cli-reference/yaml/up-project-move.description: Update the repository for a project

cli-reference/yaml/up-project-push.title: up-project-push
cli-reference/yaml/up-project-push.description: Push a project's packages to the Upbound Marketplace.

cli-reference/yaml/up-project-run.title: up-project-run
cli-reference/yaml/up-project-run.description: Run a project on a development control plane for testing.

cli-reference/yaml/up-project-simulate.title: up-project-simulate
cli-reference/yaml/up-project-simulate.description: Run a project as a simulation against an existing control plane.

cli-reference/yaml/up-project-simulation.title: up-project-simulation-complete
cli-reference/yaml/up-project-simulation.description: Force complete an in-progress project simulation

cli-reference/yaml/up-project-simulation.title: up-project-simulation-create
cli-reference/yaml/up-project-simulation.description: Start a new project simulation and wait for the results.

cli-reference/yaml/up-repository-get.title: up-repository-get
cli-reference/yaml/up-repository-get.description: Get a repository for the account.

cli-reference/yaml/up-repository-permiss.title: up-repository-permission
cli-reference/yaml/up-repository-permiss.description: Manage permissions of a repository for a team in the account.

cli-reference/yaml/up-repository-permiss.title: up-repository-permission-grant
cli-reference/yaml/up-repository-permiss.description: Grant repository permission for a team.

cli-reference/yaml/up-repository-permiss.title: up-repository-permission-list
cli-reference/yaml/up-repository-permiss.description: List all repository permissions for teams.

cli-reference/yaml/up-repository-permiss.title: up-repository-permission-revoke
cli-reference/yaml/up-repository-permiss.description: Revoke repository permission from a team.

cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-get.title: up-robot-get
cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-get.description: Get a robot for the account.

cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-team-join.title: up-robot-team-join
cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-team-join.description: Add the robot to a team.

cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-team-leave.title: up-robot-team-leave
cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-team-leave.description: Remove the robot from a team.

cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-team-list.title: up-robot-team-list
cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-team-list.description: List all teams the robot is a member of.

cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-token-create.title: up-robot-token-create
cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-token-create.description: Create a token for the robot.

cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-token-delete.title: up-robot-token-delete
cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-token-delete.description: Delete a token for the robot.

cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-token-get.title: up-robot-token-get
cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-token-get.description: Get a token for the robot.

cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-token-list.title: up-robot-token-list
cli-reference/yaml/up-robot-token-list.description: List the tokens for the robot.

cli-reference/yaml/up-space-billing-expo.title: up-space-billing-export
cli-reference/yaml/up-space-billing-expo.description: Export a billing report for submission to Upbound.

cli-reference/yaml/up-space-connect.title: up-space-connect
cli-reference/yaml/up-space-connect.description: Connect an Upbound Space to the Upbound web console.

cli-reference/yaml/up-space-disconnect.title: up-space-disconnect
cli-reference/yaml/up-space-disconnect.description: Disconnect an Upbound Space from the Upbound web console.

cli-reference/yaml/up-space-list.title: up-space-list
cli-reference/yaml/up-space-list.description: List all accessible spaces in Upbound.

cli-reference/yaml/up-space-mirror.title: up-space-mirror
cli-reference/yaml/up-space-mirror.description: Managing the mirroring of artifacts to local storage or private container registries.

cli-reference/yaml/up-test.title: up-test
cli-reference/yaml/up-test.description: Manage and run tests for projects.

cli-reference/yaml/up-test-generate.title: up-test-generate
cli-reference/yaml/up-test-generate.description: Generate a Test for a project.

cli-reference/yaml/up-token-create.title: up-token-create
cli-reference/yaml/up-token-create.description: Create a personal access token for the current user.

cli-reference/yaml/up-token-delete.title: up-token-delete
cli-reference/yaml/up-token-delete.description: Delete a personal access token for the current user.

cli-reference/yaml/up-token-get.title: up-token-get
cli-reference/yaml/up-token-get.description: Get a personal access token for the current user.

cli-reference/yaml/up-token-list.title: up-token-list
cli-reference/yaml/up-token-list.description: Get all personal access tokens for the current user.

cli-reference/yaml/up-xpkg.title: up-xpkg
cli-reference/yaml/up-xpkg.description: Deprecated. Please migrate to up project or use the crossplane CLI.

cli-reference/yaml/up-xpkg-append.title: up-xpkg-append
cli-reference/yaml/up-xpkg-append.description: Append additional files to an xpkg.

cli-reference/yaml/up-xpkg-batch.title: up-xpkg-batch
cli-reference/yaml/up-xpkg-batch.description: Batch build and push a family of service-scoped provider packages.

cli-reference/yaml/up-xpkg-build.title: up-xpkg-build
cli-reference/yaml/up-xpkg-build.description: Build a package, by default from the current directory.

cli-reference/yaml/up-xpkg-xp-extract.title: up-xpkg-xp-extract
cli-reference/yaml/up-xpkg-xp-extract.description: Extract package contents into a Crossplane cache compatible format. Fetches from a remote registry by default.

cli-reference/yaml/up-xpls-serve.title: up-xpls-serve
cli-reference/yaml/up-xpls-serve.description: run a server for Crossplane definitions using the Language Server Protocol.

cli-reference/yaml/up-xrd.title: up-xrd
cli-reference/yaml/up-xrd.description: Manage XRDs from Composite Resources(XR) or Claims(XRC).

cli-reference/yaml/up-xrd-generate.title: up-xrd-generate
cli-reference/yaml/up-xrd-generate.description: Generate an XRD from a Composite Resource (XR) or Claim (XRC).
